title: All the reservations in the Development Plan shall be rearranged/relocated, if necessary, with the same area and the same width of access road or as required under DCPR, whichever is more
clause_text: All the reservations in the Development Plan shall be rearranged/relocated, if necessary, with the same area and the same width of access road or as required under DCPR, whichever is more.
section: (I) Development of reservation in Reconstruction or redevelopment of Cluster(s) of Buildings under Cluster Development Scheme(s)under Regulation No. 33(9):

source_pdf.text_snippet: All the reservations in the Development Plan shall be rearranged/relocated, if necessary, with the same area and the same width of access road or as required under DCPR, whichever is more.
